title: Bug 6125: JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When I press the 'Finish' button in the JAR packager, it gives an error message saying 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5'.
OB: When I try to create a JAR with unsaved editors, the packager reports an error message saying 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5'.
EB: I expect to be able to create a JAR file with unsaved editors. If the editors are unsaved, there should be a dialog prompt asking if I want to save them before proceeding with JAR creation.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
1. Open the JAR packager wizard.
2. Enter all the required fields.
3. Press the 'Finish' button without saving any of the open editors.
